attributes.action: instruct the Secretary of State for Health to order all hospitals to provide at least one bed, in each ward and out-patient clinic, which would cater for people with scoliosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scoliosis is a condition of the spine which gives the sufferer the appearance of a hunchback and far more importantly, especially for this petition, makes it difficult and painful for them to lie on hard beds with no "give" for their backs.  Many treatments are sufficiently difficult and painful for those of us with straight backs; for people with scoliosis (like my husband) they become almost intolerable.
